title: Gentrification in the US and Canada

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the process of gentrification in United States and Canadian cities?

choices.label: An increase in construction of new housing for elderly and retired persons
Privately funded redevelopment of existing commercial and residential buildings
Government-led planning of public spaces such as parks and riverfronts
The sale of naming rights for stadiums and arenas
The expansion of suburban housing developments on the urban periphery

unit.text: 6: Cities and Urban Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe a relevant geographic concept, process, model, or theory in a specified context.
